sentences: Povla Frijsh (3 August 1881 – 10 July 1960) was a Danish classical soprano and voice teacher.
Frijsh was born on the island of Ærø in Denmark in 1881.
Frijsh was born on the island of Ærø in Denmark in 1881. She studied with Ove Christensen in Denmark and Jean Périer in Paris.
After a 49-year-long performance career, she retired from singing in 1947.
